article.headline: Dow flat despite gains in shares of IBM, American Express
article.body: Shares of IBM and American Express are seeing strong returns Thursday morning, propelling the Dow Jones Industrial Average into positive territory. The Dow DJIA, +0.56% is trading 23 points higher (0.1%), as shares of IBM IBM, -2.81% and American Express AXP, +0.26% are contributing to the index's intraday rally. IBM's shares are up $7.29, or 5.9%, while those of American Express are up $1.57, or 1.5%, combining for an approximately 58-point boost for the Dow. Also contributing significantly to the gain are Travelers TRV, +0.18%, Merck MRK, -0.14%, and Coca-Cola KO, +0.69%. A $1 move in any of the Dow's 30 components equates to a 6.58-point swing. Editor's Note: This story was auto-generated by Automated Insights using data from Dow Jones and FactSet. See our market data terms of use.
